subtitle: My Experience
title: Experience is what matters the most.

experiences.title: Application Development Analyst
experiences.description: Key responsibilites involved creating custom UI components for Next.js based streaming application. Also used Redux for state management and MUI as styling library.

experiences.title: Application Development Associate
experiences.description: As a Production Support Engineer performed analysis on session logs data using Splunk, EFK and Oracle SQL Developer tools. Performed health checks on application servers.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description: Designed, developed, and managed full-stack websites for clients from domains such as education, hospitality, health & food. Used PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript and MySQL.
